Primary Contact: Nicole Leblanc, Executive Assistant; Email: info@leccfo.org
Service Details: - Provides cultural support, and awareness of the richness of French language and French-speaking culture to the population of the Okanagan- Gathers and unites francophones and francophiles- Organizes French artistic and cultural events and offers French classes- Servir les membres, regrouper et unir les francophones et les francophiles, faire connaître la richesse de la langue française et de la culture francophones à toute la population de l'Okanagan
